Gene.FullName: DIS3 homolog, exosome endoribonuclease and 3'-5' exoribonuclease
ATXN8 opposite strand (non-protein coding) repeat instability region

SubmitterDescription.SubmitterName: International Standards For Cytogenomic Arrays Consortium (ISCA)

SampleDescription.Description: a complex inverted duplication involving one chromosome 13 homolog. Phenotype: cleft lip and palate
